title: PM arrives Shaheed Benazir Abad to offer condolence with Asif Zardari
content:
NAWAB SHAH, June 25 (APP): Prime Minister Muhammad Shehbaz Sharif on Saturday arrived Shaheed Benazir Abad to express his condolence with former president Asif Ali Zardari on the death of his mother.
Foreign Minister Bilawal Bhutto Zardari received the prime minister at the airport.
The prime minister was accompanied by Speaker National Assembly Raja Pervaiz Ashraf, Deputy Speaker Zahid Akram Durrani, Minister for Railways and Aviation Khawja Saad Rafique, Minister for Trade Syed Naveed Qamar and PMâ€™s Special Assistant Syed Fahad Hussain.
